Dracona and company finishe repairing all except for suukie, wgo was injure=
d too bad and would take a long time to repair..Plintissa, much to Dracona'=
s anger, had forgotten about their mission and stayed to talk to Suukie....=
the Radicons and Dracona came from the secret passage way when nobody could=
 possibly see, and walked off searching for some members......the Radicons =
bickered among themselves and Dracona studied the landscape..Dracona saw Wr=
ath and Kamodia.. "hey, you 2, over here!..." Dracona said, calling out Wra=
th and Kamodia......the Radicons drew their blasters and stood guard, Scamr=
ock laughed and played with his thumbs......Dracona showed her hands empty =
to show that she came in peace....she waved to Wrath and Kamodia.....
  ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
  Sent: Monday, May 29, 2000 9:12 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  *=
Kamodia thought she saw something for a minute but figures its all in her m=
ond continues walking on*
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECO=
DE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Monday, May 29, 2000 6:43 AM
    =
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    Plintissa looks in the distance and spots=
 Wrath and Kamodia....Plintissa knows the would be good for the People's Gr=
oup, but no wway she could invite them with these idiot Truths surrounding =
her!......she ushers to Wrath and Kamodia, hoping they'll see......
      -=
---- Original Message ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@=
egroups.com 
      Sent: Monday, May 29, 2000 2:15 AM
      Subject: Neo Be=
ast Wars


      *Wrath and Kamodia still stand on the outside of the Maxim=
al base* Wrath: HEEEEYYYY!! WE WANT A JOB!!! *Wrath yells at the top of his=
 lungs* *Than he notices Kamodia walking away* Wrath: Where are you going? =
Kamodia: I'm not sticking around here when they don't want us. Wrath: How d=
o you know that they don't? Kamodia: If they really wanted us than they'd a=
nswer us. *Kamodia turns and walks on looking for another base* *Wrath stan=
ds there thinking about what Komodia said and comes to the fact that she's =
right* Wrath: Hey wait up! *Wrath comes running up and catches up with Kamo=
dia* Kamodia: What made you leave? *She says giving off a sly grin* Wrath: =
I came to the fact that I'm too good for that dump. Kamodia: Come on, admit=
 it! I'm right. If they really wanted us then they would've answered us. *W=
rath doesn't answer and keeps looking foward* Kamodia: Your just mad becaus=
e you know I'm right but you are right about that place being a dump. *They=
 contiue walking on*
